isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - TANDEM TRANSFER FUEL PUMP; REPLACE

step1.para: Install wheel chocks.
Open hood assembly.
Disconnect battery to ground cable, include disconnect ECM ground.
Remove air cleaner housing with pipe attached, include disconnect wiring from IAT sensor.
Remove charge air cooler Hoses.
Remove air intake Y-pipe.
Obtain drain pan. Disconnect fuel lines from pump.
Remove fuel pump assembly with fuel line fitting attached.
Transfer fuel line fitting.
Replace fuel line o-rings.
Clean fuel from valley of engine.
Install fuel pump assembly with fuel line fittting attached.
Connect fuel lines to pump.
Install air intake Y-pipe, include replace o-ring seals.
Install charge air cooler hoses.
Install air cleaner housing with pipe attached, include connect wiring to IAT sensor.
Connect battery to ground cable, include connect ECM ground.
Bleed fuel system include start engine and check for leaks.
Close hood assembly.
Remove wheel chocks.
